response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and deeply personal to you, which is why I am offering it at a special price tailored to ensure we both find satisfaction in this transaction. My initial offer for the product is $750,000. I believe this price reflects its unique qualities and the potential it holds for you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or consider this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with someone who will appreciate it as much as I do.", "product_price": 750000}
